unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Cheer**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Diwali Cheer**

unnormalised: Good news for all you environmentally conscious folks in India! Getting solar panels on your rooftops is now even more affordable thanks to boosted government subsidies. Think of it as an early Diwali gift!
normalised: Good news for all you environmentally conscious folks in India! Getting solar panels on your rooftops is now even more affordable thanks to boosted government subsidies. Think of it as an early Diwali gift!

unnormalised: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy has announced increased subsidies, particularly for households in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities. For example, families in Coimbatore or Patna installing a 3kW system could see a subsidy bump of up to Rs. 20,000! That’s a significant chunk of change that can go towards, say, a delicious family biryani feast during the festive season.
normalised: The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy has announced increased subsidies, particularly for households in Tier two and Tier three cities. For example, families in Coimbatore or Patna installing a three kilowatt system could see a subsidy bump of up to rupee twenty thousand! That's a significant chunk of change that can go towards, say, a delicious family biryani feast during the festive season.

unnormalised: These subsidies are part of the broader "Surya Ghar Yojana," aiming to electrify 1 crore households. Experts from IIT Madras believe this will drastically reduce reliance on conventional energy sources and lower electricity bills – freeing up funds for those much-needed Onam celebrations next year.
normalised: These subsidies are part of the broader "Surya Ghar Yojana," aiming to electrify one crore households. Experts from I I T Madras believe this will drastically reduce reliance on conventional energy sources and lower electricity bills – freeing up funds for those much-needed Onam celebrations next year.

unnormalised: So, ditch that old generator and embrace the power of the sun! Check your local discom website for eligibility and application details. It's an investment that's good for your wallet and the planet! Namaste!
normalised: So, ditch that old generator and embrace the power of the sun! Check your local discom website for eligibility and application details. It's an investment that's good for your wallet and the planet! Namaste!
